Text: This policy is effective as of 05/20/2022.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text:
Privacy Policy Changes
This Privacy Policy will be reviewed and updated at a minimum every 12 months and may change more frequently from time to time, and at GrayHair’s sole discretion. If we make changes, we’ll revise the “Effective” date at the top of this statement. GrayHair encourages visitors to frequently check this page for
any changes to its Privacy Policy as it is the visitors’ responsibility to check for any changes or updates. If you have a grayhairsoftware.com account, you might also receive an alert informing you of these changes. Your continued use of this site after any change in this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of
such change.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text:
Category and the Information We Collect

Identifiers – A real name, alias, postal address, email address, IP address.
Personal information categories listed in the California Customer Records statute – A name, address.
Internet or other similar network activity – Browsing history, search history, information on a consumer’s interaction with a website, application, or advertisement.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Website Visitors

GrayHair collects information that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request.
GrayHair collects website information to better understand how GrayHair’s visitors use its website. From time to time, GrayHair may release website information in the aggregate, e.g., by publishing a report on trends in the usage of its website.
GrayHair also collects potentially personally identifying information like Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for logged in users and for users leaving comments on grayhairsoftware.com blogs/sites.
GrayHair will ask visitors who sign up at grayhairsoftware.com to provide a username and email address.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
From Data Subjects

GrayHair collects data directly from data subjects who are utilizing GrayHair’s services.
GrayHair obtains the necessary personal and financial information required to process those transactions.
GrayHair collects data from applicants and employees to manage the employer-employee relationship.
Third Parties

GrayHair obtains information from third parties. Our third parties include our clients in the course of providing services to them. GrayHair also purchases information from third parties who are not our clients.
GrayHair obtains name and address information from public sources. This data is used to provide services to our clients.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
Uses of information:
GrayHair uses this information in order to fulfill business activities, including to:

Improve the functionality, security, and usability of the website.
Conduct marketing and promotional activities.
Occasionally send registered users of a GrayHair website an email to describe new features, to solicit feedback or updates on what’s going on with GrayHair and our products.
Fulfill a contract with our clients or other third parties.
Provide mail tracking and address quality services to our clients.
Manage employee relationships including payroll, taxes, and benefits administration.
GrayHair only discloses logged in user and commenter IP addresses under the same circumstances that it uses and discloses personally identifying information as described below, except that commenter IP addresses and email addresses are visible and disclosed to the administrators of the blog/site where the comment was left.
Comply with applicable laws or regulations.
GrayHair will not use the personal information it collects for purposes other than those described above without providing you with notice first.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
Information Disclosure
Sale of Information

GrayHair sells name and address data it obtains from public sources as part of its business services.
GrayHair does not rent or sell potentially personally identifying information to anyone collected during the GrayHair Software login processes, applicant, or employee data.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text:
Sharing of Information

GrayHair shares potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only with those of its employees, contractors, and affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to process it on GrayHair’s behalf or to provide services available at GrayHair’s websites, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to others.

GrayHair shares information for the following business purposes:

Auditing relating to a current interaction
Detecting security incidents
Debugging to identify and repair errors
Short-term, transient use, provided that personal information is not disclosed to another party and
not used to build a profile
Performing services on behalf of GrayHair or service provider (maintaining or servicing accounts,
providing customer service, processing or fulfilling orders, processing payments, providing
analytics, providing ads or marketing services)
Undertaking internal research
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text:
GrayHair may publish any request or question you send to us about our services or software (for example via email or via one of our feedback mechanisms) to help us clarify or respond to your request or to help us support other users.

GrayHair discloses personally-identifying information in response to a subpoena, court order or other governmental requests, or when GrayHair believes in good faith that disclosure is reasonably necessary to protect the property or rights of GrayHair, third parties, or the public at large.

GrayHair has shared the following categories of personal information for a business purpose in the last twelve months:

Category and Examples:
Identifiers – A real name, alias, postal address, unique personal identifier, online identifier, IP address, email address, account name, or other similar identifiers.

Personal information categories listed in the California Customer Records statute – A name, address, telephone number.

Internet or other similar network activity – Browsing history, search history, information on a consumer’s interaction with GrayHair’s website, application, or advertisement.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Right to non-discrimination – Consumers shall not be discriminated against for exercising any of these consumer privacy rights.

Text: Do Not Sell My Personal Information – Please send an email to privacy@grayhairsoftware.com and you will receive a form that will enable you to halt an activity regarding your personal information. Additionally, you may also call 1-702-900-2272 and leave a detailed message with your contact information including your name and a valid email address and we will get in touch with you to complete the process.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Ads appearing on any of our websites may be delivered to users by advertising partners, who may set cookies. These cookies allow the ad server to recognize your computer each time they send you an online advertisement to compile information about you or others who use your computer. This information allows\nad networks to, among other things, deliver targeted advertisements that they believe will be of most interest to you.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: This policy is effective as of 05/20/2022.

Text:
Types of Information We Collect:

GrayHair collects the below categories and specific pieces of personal information. GrayHair has collected the following categories and types of personal information about consumers within the last twelve (12) months:

Category and the Information We Collect

Identifiers – A real name, alias, postal address, email address, IP address.
Personal information categories listed in the California Customer Records statute – A name, address.
Internet or other similar network activity – Browsing history, search history, information on a consumer’s interaction with a website, application, or advertisement.

Sources of Information

GrayHair collects only as much information as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the interaction with GrayHair.

GrayHair collects this information from the following sources:

Website Visitors

GrayHair collects information that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request.
GrayHair collects website information to better understand how GrayHair’s visitors use its website. From time to time, GrayHair may release website information in the aggregate, e.g., by publishing a report on trends in the usage of its website.
GrayHair also collects potentially personally identifying information like Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for logged in users and for users leaving comments on grayhairsoftware.com blogs/sites.
GrayHair will ask visitors who sign up at grayhairsoftware.com to provide a username and email address. Visitors can always refuse to supply personally identifying information, with the caveat that it may prevent them from engaging in certain website-related activities.
From Data Subjects

GrayHair collects data directly from data subjects who are utilizing GrayHair’s services.
GrayHair obtains the necessary personal and financial information required to process those transactions.
GrayHair collects data from applicants and employees to manage the employer-employee relationship.
Third Parties

GrayHair obtains information from third parties. Our third parties include our clients in the course of providing services to them. GrayHair also purchases information from third parties who are not our clients.
GrayHair obtains name and address information from public sources. This data is used to provide services to our clients.
Uses of information:
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Fulfill a contract with our clients or other third parties.
Provide mail tracking and address quality services to our clients.
Manage employee relationships including payroll, taxes, and benefits administration.
GrayHair only discloses logged in user and commenter IP addresses under the same circumstances that it uses and discloses personally identifying information as described below, except that commenter IP addresses and email addresses are visible and disclosed to the administrators of the blog/site where the comment was left.
Comply with applicable laws or regulations.
GrayHair will not use the personal information it collects for purposes other than those described above without providing you with notice first.

Text: Cookies\nA cookie is a string of information that a website stores on a visitor’s computer, and that the visitor’s browser provides to the website each time the visitor returns. Session cookies are cookies that disappear you’re your computer or browser when you turn off your computer. Persistent cookies stay on your\ncomputer even after you’ve turned it off. GrayHair uses session cookies to help GrayHair identify and track visitors, their usage of GrayHair website, and their website access preferences.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: GrayHair visitors who do not wish to have cookies placed on their computers should set their browsers to refuse cookies before\nusing GrayHair’s websites, with the drawback that certain features of GrayHair’s websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies.
Label: Methods to exercise rights
